title: 'The Challenge: Spies, Lies, and Allies' Season Premiere | Death, Taxes, and Bananas
description:
Johnny Bananas is joined by Bill Simmons to kick off the 37th season of ‘The Challenge.’ They discuss Johnny Bananas’s ‘Challenge’ status (3:20), how this new season compares to seasons past (7:15), and break down roommate pairings, contestants, and favorites from Episode 1 (21:54). 
Host: Johnny Bananas
Guest: Bill Simmons
Producer: Craig Horlbeck
Associate Producer: Erika Cervantes
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
